name: Freeblade Mercenaries
author: guitarninja
lore: In a distant and war-torn region of the galaxy, where the fires of conflict rage on countless planets, a formidable group of mercenaries known as the Freeblade Mercenaries emerged to claim their place in the annals of history.undefinedLong ago, a visionary engineer and battle-scarred warrior named Kellan Greythorne sought to change the tide of war. Witnessing the devastation caused by relentless conflicts and the plight of innocent civilians caught in the crossfire, Kellan was determined to create a force that could bring balance to the chaos.undefinedWith a brilliant mind for engineering and a deep understanding of combat tactics, Kellan conceived the idea of building colossal fighting robots, known as Battleframes, which could rival the destructive might of any army. These towering mechanical giants were not only marvels of technology but also powerful symbols of hope and protection for those they defended.undefinedKellan founded the Freeblade Mercenaries with a core group of skilled engineers, warriors, and strategists, all sharing his vision of offering their services to the highest bidder. The Freeblades saw themselves as guardians of the innocent, a neutral force that could be hired to defend planets, liberate oppressed civilizations, or push back invading forces.undefinedTheir headquarters, known as the Forge Bastion, became a mobile fortress and workshop, where skilled engineers and mechanics meticulously crafted and maintained the Battleframes. Each Freeblade was equipped with unique weaponry and defenses, tailored to their pilot's preferences and abilities.undefinedAs the reputation of the Freeblade Mercenaries spread throughout the galaxy, they became highly sought after by leaders of warring factions, governments, and wealthy corporations. The Freeblades' services were not cheap, but their effectiveness on the battlefield was unquestionable.undefinedDespite their mercenary nature, the Freeblades developed a strong code of honor. They refused to participate in genocidal campaigns or support tyrants, adhering to a set of principles that set them apart from common mercenaries. They were warriors with a purpose, aiming to bring stability and peace to the chaotic realms they traversed.undefinedThe Freeblades' ranks expanded over time as skilled pilots and engineers sought to join their cause, drawn by the chance to wield the immense power of the Battleframes and the promise of making a difference in the galaxy.undefinedHowever, the path of the Freeblade Mercenaries was not without challenges. They faced enemies who sought to discredit and dismantle them, as well as internal struggles to maintain their neutrality and honor in the face of lucrative offers and moral dilemmas.undefinedThrough it all, Kellan Greythorne and his fellow Freeblades stood firm, committed to their mission of bringing justice and protection to those in need. Their legend grew, and the name of the Freeblade Mercenaries became synonymous with both awe and trepidation.undefinedIn the swirling storm of war and politics, the Freeblade Mercenaries strode forward, a formidable force for hire, guided by their principles and the belief that their immense power should be used for the betterment of the galaxy. As long as there were battles to be fought and innocents to defend, the Freeblades would continue to stand as a beacon of hope in the darkest corners of the cosmos.

ion_shields.name: Ion Shields
ion_shields.description: Use this strategy when one of your units is targeted by an attack. Roll a die for each hit, on a 3 or less that hit is prevented.
ion_shields.flavor: Knight Lords are equipped with powerful ion shields which allow them to deflect the heaviest of firepower.

heroic_moment.description: Use when a unit shoots or fights. That unit may re-roll failed skill tests of 9+.

final_stand.name: Final Stand
final_stand.description: Use when a unit is destroyed. If that unit has not activated yet this round, it may perform one shoot or _Fight_ action before it is destroyed.
final_stand.flavor: A Knight Lord fights to the last breath.
